required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Prasugrel in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: Relative Bioavailability of Prasugrel Orally Disintegrating Tablet Formulations and the Effect of Food on the Bioavailability of the Orally Disintegrating Tablet in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the amount of drug available in the body when given to healthy participants as two different formulations with or without a meal. In addition, this study will evaluate how much of the drug gets into the blood stream and how long the body takes to get rid of it. Information about any side effects that may occur will also be collected. Each participant will receive a total of five different treatments. Each treatment is given by mouth, once a day. The treatment period lasts for five consecutive days.

detailed_description.textblock: The reference formulation is an orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) and the test formulation is an orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2).

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of Prasugrel Test and Reference Formulation
primary_outcome.description: Cmax= maximum concentration measured from predose through 8 hours postdose. Test formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) and the reference formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) specific to the 5 milligrams (mg) prasugrel dosing. Pharmacokinetics will measure prasugrel's (LY640315) active metabolite.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Concentration Curve (AUC) of Prasugrel Reference and Test Formulation
primary_outcome.description: AUC(0-tlast) = area under the concentration versus time curve from time zero to time t, where t is the last time point with a measurable concentration. Test formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) and the reference formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) specific to the 5 mg prasugrel dosing. Pharmacokinetics will measure prasugrel's active metabolite.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of Prasugrel Test Formulation in Fasted and Fed State
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax= maximum concentration measured from predose through 8 hours postdose. Test formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) specific to the 5 mg prasugrel dosing in the fasted and fed state. Pharmacokinetics will measure prasugrel's active metabolite.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Concentration Curve (AUC) of Prasugrel Test Formulation in Fasted and Fed State
secondary_outcome.description: AUC(0-tlast) = area under the concentration versus time curve from time zero to time t, where t is the last time point with a measurable concentration. Test formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) specific to the 5 mg prasugrel dosing in the fasted and fed state. Pharmacokinetics will measure prasugrel's active metabolite.

arm_group.description: 5 mg Prasugrel as orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) formulation administered once in the fasted state.
5 mg Prasugrel as orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) formulation administered once in the fasted state.
5 mg Prasugrel as ODT2 formulation dispersed in water administered once, in the fasted state.
5 mg Prasugrel as ODT2 formulation administered once, following a standardized breakfast.
2 mg Prasugrel as ODT2 formulation administered once in the fasted state.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body mass index (BMI) of 18.5 to 32.0 kilograms per square meter (kg/m^2)
Exclusion Criteria:
- No known allergies to Prasugrel or related compound
- No regular alcohol intake greater than 21 units per week for males or 14 units per week for females

overall_official.last_name: Call 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559) or 1-317-615-4559 Mon - Fri 9 AM - 5 PM Eastern time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST)

facility.name: For additional information regarding investigative sites for this trial, contact 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559, 1-317-615-4559) Mon - Fri from 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST), or speak with your personal physician.

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Participants were to be given 5 single doses of prasugrel in 5 different sequences on each of 5 consecutive mornings of treatment.

group.title: Sequence 1
group.description: Day 1= 5 milligrams (mg) prasugrel without Magnasweet (reference) orally disintegrating tablet (ODT1), given on top of tongue in fasted state (T-Fast); Day 2= 5 mg prasugrel with Magnasweet (test) orally disintegrating tablet (ODT2),T-Fast; Day 3= 5 mg test ODT2, given dispersed in water in fasted state (W-Fast); Day 4= 5 mg test ODT2, given on top of tongue in fed state (T-Fed); Day 5= 2 mg test ODT2, T-Fast

group.title: Sequence 2
group.description: Day 1= 2 mg test ODT2, T-Fast; Day 2= 5 mg ODT1, T-Fast; Day 3= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fast; Day 4= 5 mg test ODT2, W-Fast; Day 5= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fed

group.title: Sequence 3
group.description: Day 1= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fed; Day 2= 2 mg test ODT2, T-Fast; Day 3= 5 mg ODT1, T-Fast; Day 4= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fast; Day 5= 5 mg test ODT2, W-Fast

group.title: Sequence 4
group.description: Day 1= 5 mg test ODT2, W-Fast; Day 2= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fed; Day 3= 2 mg test ODT2, T-Fast; Day 4= 5 mg ODT1,T-Fast; Day 5= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fast

group.title: Sequence 5
group.description: Day 1= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fast; Day 2= 5 mg test ODT2, W-Fast; Day 3= 5 mg test ODT2, T-Fed; Day 4= 2 mg test ODT2, T-Fast; Day 5= 5 mg ODT1, T-Fast

milestone.title: Received at Least 1 Dose of Study Drug

participants_list.participants: Withdrew consent prior to dosing on this treatment day.

group.title: All Participants
group.description: 5 mg Prasugrel as orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® formulation (ODT1) or orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® formulation (ODT2) given either on top of tongue or dispersed in water administered in either the fasted or fed state. 2 mg prasugrel ODT2 given on top of tongue in the fasted state.

class.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Pharmacokinetics: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of Prasugrel Test and Reference Formulation
outcome.description: Cmax= maximum concentration measured from predose through 8 hours postdose. Test formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) and the reference formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) specific to the 5 milligrams (mg) prasugrel dosing. Pharmacokinetics will measure prasugrel's (LY640315) active metabolite.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic population consists of all participants who received at least one dose of study drug and have evaluable pharmacokinetic data.

group.title: 5 mg Prasugrel (ODT1)
group.description: 5 mg Prasugrel as orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) formulation administered orally once in the fasted state.

group.title: 5 mg Prasugrel (ODT2)
group.description: 5 mg Prasugrel as orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) formulation administered orally once in the fasted state.

measure.title: Pharmacokinetics: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of Prasugrel Test and Reference Formulation
measure.description: Cmax= maximum concentration measured from predose through 8 hours postdose. Test formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) and the reference formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) specific to the 5 milligrams (mg) prasugrel dosing. Pharmacokinetics will measure prasugrel's (LY640315) active metabolite.
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic population consists of all participants who received at least one dose of study drug and have evaluable pharmacokinetic data.

analysis.param_type: Ratio of Geometric Least Squares Means
analysis.estimate_desc: Least Squares (LS) means were determined by mixed-effect linear models with treatment, period, sequence as fixed effects, and participants nested within sequence as random effect.

outcome.title: Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Concentration Curve (AUC) of Prasugrel Reference and Test Formulation
outcome.description: AUC(0-tlast) = area under the concentration versus time curve from time zero to time t, where t is the last time point with a measurable concentration. Test formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2) and the reference formulation is defined as the orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) specific to the 5 mg prasugrel dosing. Pharmacokinetics will measure prasugrel's active metabolite.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic population consists of all participants who received at least one dose of study drug and have evaluable pharmacokinetic data.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
